mapper.update: update sss_car set route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_origin = #{carOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_pro_date = #{carProDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_buy_date = #{carBuyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_capacity = #{carCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_state = #{carState,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_id, route_id, car_type, car_origin, car_pro_date, car_buy_date, car_capacity, car_state, comment from sss_car where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select car_id, route_id, car_type, car_origin, car_pro_date, car_buy_date, car_capacity, car_state, comment from sss_car
